title: With Manchester United now the priority, Dave Brailsford relinquishes Ineos Grenadiers’ role
content:
End of an era as Team Sky co-founder steps away from team principal spot, but he will still exert influence.

Read the full article at With Manchester United now the priority, Dave Brailsford relinquishes Ineos Grenadiers’ role on Velo.
author: sstokes
